channel.title: I need help with admins mods, owner, etc. *******HELP********
channel.description: I tryed putting either a 1, 2 , or a 3 infront of a name in characters, but it still doesn't work what is the problem? Please help. :confused:

item.title: I need help with admins mods, owner, etc. *******HELP********
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“One Night Stand, post:2, topic:108729”]No you go in their char .txt folder and search for playerRights.
The status for each one is :

0- Normal player
1- Player Moderator
2- Administrator
3- Server Owner[/quote] forgot 4 witch douse nuthing but can be used to have a admin spy+ any command 0-3 can use 4 can also use

item.title: I need help with admins mods, owner, etc. *******HELP********
item.dc:creator: @One_Night_Stand One Night Stand
item.description:
@One_Night_Stand wrote:

No you go in their char .txt folder and search for playerRights.
The status for each one is :

0- Normal player
1- Player Moderator
2- Administrator
3- Server Owner

Read full topic
